Technology Stack¶

In this document I describe the different frameworks, services, technologies, tools and packages used in my Data, Models and Analytics Paradigm

Frameworks¶

  • Api: Python
  • Back end: Python Django_ with Django REST Framework.
  • Front end: Angular

Services¶

  • Application Monitoring: Sentry
  • CI/ CD: Azure DevOps
  • Cloud Paas: Azure
  • Code repository: Azure DevOps
  • Collaboration: Trello or Azure DevOps
  • Directory Service: Azure Active Directory
  • Email Service: Office 365

Technologies¶

  • Message Broker: Rabbit MQ
  • Relational Databases: Postgres or Microsoft SQL Server
  • Containers: Docker
  • HTTP Server: NGINX
  • Python WSGI HTTP Server: Gunicorn

Tools¶

  • Code Editor: Visual Studio Code (VS Code Django Tutorial, VS Code Angular Tutorial)
  • Git Cli: Git
  • Diagram Editor: Dia

Packages¶

Python¶

Development¶

The below packages are listed in my requirements.dev.text file.

  • Auto formatter: Black
  • Documentation Sphinx (Docs, Quick Start, Cheat Sheet, Practical Intro, Django)
    • Theme: Read the Docs theme
    • Markdown: Recommonmark
    • Autobuild: SphinxAutoLoad
  • Linter: Pylint
  • Make file: Pymake
  • Shell: Ipython

Test¶

All¶

  • Pipenv (Docs, Tutorial)

The below packages are listed in my requirements.test.text file.

  • Test Framework: pytest
  • Profiling: pytest-profiling
  • Browser testing: Selenium
